name: sloom
description:
you stopped to get gas, and fell right through.

three keys.

escape the room.

welcome to sloom_

(Submission for the FSU FA 22 Game Jam, 4 day project)

====================

wasd - move

ctrl while moving - slide

esc to exit

====================
